title: Ten years from Colombo
creator_credit: Donald Fraser and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Ten years after the Colombo Plan, the people of Pakistan, Ceylon and other ancient lands envisage a future of material prosperity brought about through mutual cooperation.
